title: The Cost of Support
body:
Adore your Support Champion?

What is the cost of appreciating the awesomeness of a Healer, ammo supplier, tactical response co-ordinator and last-call for all rescue needs type of champ?

Problem is; battle hungry recruits whose only interests include scoring that kill, even at the cost of squadmates, calling out your, "lack of prowess," "low K/D/- rate," "Are you a bot, Sona?", "Oh, _[that champ]_ is AFK," "Report," "report," "REPORT... !"

With pounding out the plusses(Health & Energy), keeping the bullets in your teams guns (Mana), putting the old 'hey, slow down there" 's like distortion, sticky bits and general pain-in-the-neck's, there is so much more diameter, that is; breadth to the entire package.  

Tanks included.

Ever gotten in under that Turret that had put 3 shots on your squishy?

There is just that little rat runnin' around the cupboards, scuttling across the bridge like it is a walk-in pantry, stealing your cheese!  Then the responsibility of the tank comes into play like a big cat.  It costs.  That hospital bed is not always as comfy as one might seem.

But don't let the bed bugs bite.  Get back into that Abyss and do what can't be done.  Do that which is not expected.
